product_name: Bison Designs Fold-A-Bowl Dog Bowl - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The Bison Designs Fold-A-Bowl Dog Bowl folds into itself for simple packing and weighs only 2 oz. so you can carry it along on all your hiking trips to keep your dog fed and happy. Water-tight construction lets you fill the bowl with drinking water or dog food. Included plastic clip clips folded bowl onto your pack. Overstock.
short_description: The Bison Designs Fold-A-Bowl Dog Bowl folds into itself for simple packing and weighs only 2 oz. so you can carry it along on all your hiking trips to keep your dog fed and happy.
